option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/draw_dialog_bg" /> <corners android:radius="20dp" /> <stroke android:width="2dp" android:color="@color/draw_dialog_accent" /> </shape>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_bg" android:gravity="center"> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:textAlignment="center" android:text="Draw Offer has been sent" android:textSize="20sp" android:textColor="#1C1C1D" /> <com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView android:id="@+id/lottie_draw_offer_sent" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="200dp" app:lottie_autoPlay="true" app:lottie_loop="true" app:lottie_fileName="loading_sand_clock.json" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_draw_dialog" android:gravity="center"> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:textAlignment="center" android:text="Draw Offer has been sent" android:textSize="20sp" android:textColor="@color/draw_dialog_text" /> <com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView android:id="@+id/lottie_draw_offer_sent" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="200dp" app:lottie_autoPlay="true" app:lottie_loop="true" app:lottie_fileName="loading_sand_clock.json" />
</LinearLayout>
